summary: Frontend references were updated to point to the new logo filenames (brandAssets.ts and social meta tags in index.html). However, the diff does not show the new generated logo image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, nor does it include evidence of the actual logo designs being created. The diff also includes additional, unrequested UI/content/styling changes and a new preloader component.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create new bold, youthful, forward-thinking typographic logo designs (horizontal, icon, social) that are legible at small sizes.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only updates code references to new filenames; it does not include any evidence of the actual logo image design work being created/updated.
evidence: frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts (only path updates; no assets shown)
File diff summary shows no additions under frontend/public/assets/generated

missing_requirements.requirement: Include the newly generated logo image files under frontend/public/assets/generated so the app builds without broken image links.
missing_requirements.reason: No files under frontend/public/assets/generated are shown as added/modified in the diff summary, so the presence of the required PNG files cannot be verified.
evidence: File diff summary (Added: 1, Modified: 5) does not list any frontend/public/assets/generated additions

hallucinated_features.description: Added a runtime image preloader component that loads logo assets and logs success/failure to the console.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; requirements only asked to update asset references and include the static files.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/changed additional brand asset constants for JPG variants (logoHorizontalJpg/logoIconJpg/logoSocialJpg) pointing to the same PNG paths.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest only specifies updating references to the new PNG filenames.

hallucinated_features.description: Broader visual/content/styling changes across the frontend (global styles, Tailwind config, header/footer/sections content).
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicit non-goal: do not redesign full site layout/section content beyond updating logo asset references. The diff summary indicates multiple unrelated UI/content modifications.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entries for frontend/index.css, frontend/tailwind.config.js, frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts, and multiple section/component files)
